ygData.subject: (Song) "Gnolls Marching"
ygData.msgSnippet: Gnolls Marching by Jay Sutton  (Sung to the tune of Ants Marching by Dave Matthews Band) He wakes up in the morning Drop of milk
ygData.messageBody:
"Gnolls Marching"
by Jay Sutton <rmsutton@...>
(Sung to the tune of Ants Marching by Dave Matthews Band)

He wakes up in the morning
Drop of milk bite to eat and he's fighting
Never changes a thing
The week ends, the week begins

She thinks, we fight with each other
Emote whatever were thinking
But we never say a thing
And these campers around us get meaner

Take those campers
Place them on ignore until a quieter time
Root fails, you up and die

Goes to fight putrid skellies
He's diseased, cleric heals up and he buffs him
And remembers being new
Playing at West Gate and cursing the guards

Take those campers
Place them on ignore until a quieter time
Root fails, you up and die

Driving down in Blackburrow
All these trains and up in the tunnel
Campers in every direction
No words exchanged no time to exchange them
And all the little gnolls go marching
Spells and swords and fists are flying
They all do it the same
They all do it the same way

Gold and plat tempting the thoughts of a kill stealer
Tortured by spell cost
Exploits cutting the corners
There's a Runed staff, Runed staff, cast, cast
There's a group I'm gonna offend, cast, cast, cast, cast

Take those campers
Place them on ignore until a quieter time
Root fails, you up and die

"Gnolls Marching" was written by
Jay Sutton rmsutton@...
